dashboard.title: Nchịkọta Dashboard
dashboard.recommendations: Ndụmọdụ iji mee ka akara ụgwọ gị dịkwuo mma:
dashboard.not_in_cooperative: Ị ka abụbeghị onye otu ọrụkọ ọ bụla
dashboard.profile_incomplete: Mezue profaịlụ ego gị iji mee ka akara ụgwọ gị dịkwuo mma

financial_profile.title: Profaịlụ Ego
financial_profile.subtitle_existing: Jikwaa ozi ego gị iji melite akara ụgwọ gị
financial_profile.subtitle_new: Mezuo profaịlụ ego gị iji nweta akara ụgwọ gị
financial_profile.completion_incomplete: Mezuo {remaining}% ọzọ iji meghee ike ụgwọ gị zuru oke
financial_profile.completion_complete: Profaịlụ gị ezuola! Debe ya ka ọ dị ọhụrụ maka akara ụgwọ ziri ezi.
financial_profile.income_description: Gwa anyị maka ebe ego gị si abata
financial_profile.business_description: Ozi gbasara azụmahịa na akụ gị
financial_profile.patterns_description: Nyere anyị aka ịghọta omume ego gị
financial_profile.seasonal_income: Ego m na-abata na-agbanwe dịka oge si dị
financial_profile.income_variation_placeholder: Kọwaa otú ego gị na-abata si agbanwe n'ime afọ...
financial_profile.community_description: Ọrụ gị na obodo na-emetụta profaịlụ ụgwọ gị
financial_profile.social_connections_placeholder: Kọwaa netwọk mmekọrịta gị na njikọ obodo...
financial_profile.score_based_on: Akara gị dabere na {completion}% mmecha profaịlụ. Mejupụta ọzọ iji melite izi ezi.

currency_settings.title: Ntọala Ego na Asụsụ
currency_settings.description: Hazie ego na mpaghara ị chọrọ maka ikpo okwu
currency_settings.current_description: Nhọrọ ego na mpaghara gị ugbu a
currency_settings.currency_description: Họrọ ego ị chọrọ maka ngosipụta ego niile
currency_settings.locale_description: Họrọ mpaghara ị chọrọ maka nhazi nọmba na ụbọchị
currency_settings.info_immediate: • Mgbanwe ego ga-egosi ozugbo na ikpo okwu
currency_settings.info_persist: • Echekwala ntọala gị na akaụntụ gị ma ga-adịgide n'etiti oge
currency_settings.info_locale: • Mpaghara na-emetụta nhazi nọmba, ngosipụta ụbọchị na nhazi ego
currency_settings.info_accurate: • Ngụkọta ego niile na-anọgide ziri ezi n'agbanyeghị ego ngosipụta
currency_settings.important_note: Dị mkpa: Ntọala ndị a na-emetụta otú a na-egosi data ego na ngwa ahụ niile.

settings.title: Ntọala
settings.description: Jikwaa mmasị akaụntụ gị na ntọala ikpo okwu
settings.currency_description: Hazie ego na ntọala mpaghara ị chọrọ
settings.profile_description: Melite ozi onwe gị na mmasị
settings.security_description: Jikwaa okwuntụghe gị na ntọala nchekwa
settings.notifications_description: Chịkwaa otú ị na-anata mmelite na ịdọ aka ná ntị
settings.payment_description: Jikwaa nhọrọ ịkwụ ụgwọ gị na nkọwa ụlọ akụ
